BaseString.Description: This function translates any non-English language string to English language provided necessary dictionary and translations are present. If required dictionary or translation is not present then actual string is returned.
BaseString.Name: BaseString

CaseConvert.Description: This function is used to convert all letters of a String which is passed as parameter to relevant case.

Parameters.Keywords: All Capital, All Lower, First Upper Case, Lower Case, Normal, Proper Case, Small Case, Title Case, Title Case Exact, Upper Case

CaseConvert.Name: CaseConvert

CommaList.Description: This function concatenates all the values specified as parameters with comma separation to form a single string.
CommaList.Name: CommaList

CountOccurences.Description: This function counts the number of occurence of a substring in a given string
CountOccurences.Name: CountOccurences

ExactMatch.Description: This function is used to compare two strings for exact match.It returns a Logical Value.
ExactMatch.Name: ExactMatch

ExciseSupplierRGNo.Description: This function takes first parameter as godown or taxunit object type and second as master name and then optionally any number of voucher types. This function returns the last value of last voucher TradersSupplierRGNo among all the voucher type
ExciseSupplierRGNo.Name: ExciseSupplierRGNo

ExtractNumbers.Description: This function gets the numeric string from a alpha-num string
ExtractNumbers.Name: ExtractNumbers

ExtractPatternEx.Description: This function extracts the values mentioned in the pattern from the string
ExtractPatternEx.Name: ExtractPatternEx

FetchSeparator.Description: This function returns C_FETCH_SEPARATOR character that is used for separating multiple object names in FETCH OBJECT attribute.
FetchSeparator.Name: FetchSeparator

FullList.Description: This function returns a list of comma separated values of a given particular method specified as 2nd parameter form a collection which is passed as 1st parameter.
FullList.Name: FullList

FullListEx.Description: This function returns a list of specified character separated values of a given particular method specified as 2nd parameter from a collection which is passed as 1st parameter.
FullListEx.Name: FullListEx

GetValidFileName.Description: This function returns the Valid FileName by removing disallowed characters.
GetValidFileName.Name: GetValidFileName

GroupAdvances.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved group in Tally called Advances.
GroupAdvances.Name: GroupAdvances

GroupBank.Description: This function returns the name of the  Reserved Group Name Bank Account.
GroupBank.Name: GroupBank

GroupBankOD.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved Group Bank OD A/c.
GroupBankOD.Name: GroupBankOD

GroupBranches.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved group Branch/Divisions.
GroupBranches.Name: GroupBranches

GroupCapital.Description: This function returns the name of the reserved group Capital Account.
GroupCapital.Name: GroupCapital

GroupCash.Description: This function returns the name of the  Reserved group in Tally called Cash-In-Hand.
GroupCash.Name: GroupCash

GroupCurrentAssets.Description: This function returns the name of the reserved group Current Assets.
GroupCurrentAssets.Name: GroupCurrentAssets

GroupCurrentLiab.Description: Gives the name of the reserved group Current Liabilities.
GroupCurrentLiab.Name: GroupCurrentLiab

GroupDeposits.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved group in Tally called Deposits.
GroupDeposits.Name: GroupDeposits

GroupDirectExpenses.Description: This function returns the name of the  Reserved Group, Direct Expenses.
GroupDirectExpenses.Name: GroupDirectExpenses

GroupDirectIncomes.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved Group, Direct Incomes.
GroupDirectIncomes.Name: GroupDirectIncomes

GroupDuties.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved Group Name Duties & Taxes.
GroupDuties.Name: GroupDuties

GroupFixedAssets.Description: This function returns the name of the reserved group Fixed Assets.
GroupFixedAssets.Name: GroupFixedAssets

GroupIndirectExpenses.Description: This function returns the name of Reserved Group Indirect Expenses.
GroupIndirectExpenses.Name: GroupIndirectExpenses

GroupIndirectIncomes.Description: This function returns the name of Reserved Group Indirect Incomes.
GroupIndirectIncomes.Name: GroupIndirectIncomes

GroupInvestments.Description: This function returns the name of the  reserved group Investments.
GroupInvestments.Name: GroupInvestments

GroupLoansLiab.Description: This function returns the name of the  reserved group Loans(Liability).
GroupLoansLiab.Name: GroupLoansLiab

GroupMiscExp.Description: Returns name of the reserved group Misc. Expenses (ASSET).
GroupMiscExp.Name: GroupMiscExp

GroupProvisions.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved Group Provisions.
GroupProvisions.Name: GroupProvisions

GroupPurchase.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved Group, Purchase Account.
GroupPurchase.Name: GroupPurchase

GroupReserves.Description: It returns the name of the Reserved Group Reserves & Surplus.
GroupReserves.Name: GroupReserves

GroupSales.Description: This function returns the Reserved Group Name Sales Account.
GroupSales.Name: GroupSales

GroupSecuredLoans.Description: This function returns the Reserved Group Name Secured Loans.
GroupSecuredLoans.Name: GroupSecuredLoans

GroupStock.Description: This function returns the Reserved Group Name Stock-in-Hand.
GroupStock.Name: GroupStock

GroupSundryCreditors.Description: This function returns the Name of the Reserved Group Sundry Creditors.
GroupSundryCreditors.Name: GroupSundryCreditors

GroupSundryDebtors.Description: This function refers to the Reserved group in Tally called Sundry Debtors.
GroupSundryDebtors.Name: GroupSundryDebtors

GroupSuspense.Description: This function returns the name of the Reserved Group Suspense A/c.
GroupSuspense.Name: GroupSuspense

GroupUnsecuredLoans.Description: This function returns the Reserved Group Name Unsecured Loans.
GroupUnsecuredLoans.Name: GroupUnsecuredLoans

GSTTaxUnitFirstApplDate.Description: Gives earliest GST applicable date across all GST tax units.
GSTTaxUnitFirstApplDate.Name: GSTTaxUnitFirstApplDate

IgnoreTallyNoiseCharsUCase.Description: Return string after removing noise characters and converting it to upper case
IgnoreTallyNoiseCharsUCase.Name: IgnoreTallyNoiseCharsUCase

IsActuals.Description: To check whether the value of the parameter is 'Actual'.
IsActuals.Name: IsActuals

IsAllEmpty.Description: This function checks whether all the passed parameters having empty values or not. This function accepts multiple parameters.
IsAllEmpty.Name: IsAllEmpty

IsAlphabet.Description: To check if the parameter passed has only alphabet.
IsAlphabet.Name: IsAlphabet

IsAlphaNumeric.Description: To check if the parameter passed has only alphabet and numbers.
IsAlphaNumeric.Name: IsAlphaNumeric

IsAnyEmpty.Description: To check if the any expression evaluates to an empty value.
IsAnyEmpty.Name: IsAnyEmpty

IsCurrent.Description: This function will return true if variable value is blank or sysname 'Stock-In-Hand'. It's same as 'IsCurrentVar' but used for repeated variable.
IsCurrent.Name: IsCurrent

IsDefault.Description: This function returns true if the value passed to it is TDLSysName 'Default'.
IsDefault.Name: IsDefault

IsEmpty.Description: To check if the parameter passed is Empty.
IsEmpty.Name: IsEmpty

IsEnd.Description: To check if the selected item is an End Of List.
IsEnd.Name: IsEnd

IsEndOfList.Description: To check if the selected item is an End Of List.
IsEndOfList.Name: IsEndOfList

IsEqual.Description: To check whether the two parameters passed is equal or not.The function $$IsEqual is used to check whether the parameters that is passed to the function is equal or not. These parameters can be of any type and the function returns a logical value 'Yes' if they are equal otherwise it returns 'No'.
IsEqual.Name: IsEqual

IsExcelColumnNameValid.Description: This function is used to check if the string passed is a valid Excel column or not.
IsExcelColumnNameValid.Name: IsExcelColumnNameValid

IsExcelColumnRangeValid.Description: This function is used to check if the ending Excel column is greater than or equal to the starting Excel column or not.
IsExcelColumnRangeValid.Name: IsExcelColumnRangeValid

IsGroupAdvances.Description: This function is used to  check  if the current object is the group  “Loans & Advances”.
IsGroupAdvances.Name: IsGroupAdvances

IsGroupBank.Description: This function is used to check if the group belongs to Bank Accounts or not.
IsGroupBank.Name: IsGroupBank

IsGroupBankOD.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Bank OD Accounts.
IsGroupBankOD.Name: IsGroupBankOD

IsGroupBranches.Description: It is used to check whether the current object is the Group.
IsGroupBranches.Name: IsGroupBranches

IsGroupCapital.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Capital Account.
IsGroupCapital.Name: IsGroupCapital

IsGroupCash.Description: This function is used to check if the group belongs to Cash-in-Hand or not.
IsGroupCash.Name: IsGroupCash

IsGroupCurrentAssets.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Current Assets.
IsGroupCurrentAssets.Name: IsGroupCurrentAssets

IsGroupCurrentLiab.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Current Liabilities.
IsGroupCurrentLiab.Name: IsGroupCurrentLiab

IsGroupDeposits.Description: This function is used to  check  if the current object is the group Deposits.
IsGroupDeposits.Name: IsGroupDeposits

IsGroupDirectExpenses.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Direct Expenses
IsGroupDirectExpenses.Name: IsGroupDirectExpenses

IsGroupDirectIncomes.Description: This function is used to check, whether the group belongs to Direct Incomes or not.
IsGroupDirectIncomes.Name: IsGroupDirectIncomes

IsGroupDuties.Description: This function is used to check if the group belongs to Duties and Taxes.
IsGroupDuties.Name: IsGroupDuties

IsGroupFixedAssets.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Fixed Assets.
IsGroupFixedAssets.Name: IsGroupFixedAssets

IsGroupIndirectExpenses.Description: This function is used to check if the group belongs to Indirect Expenses or not.
IsGroupIndirectExpenses.Name: IsGroupIndirectExpenses

IsGroupIndirectIncomes.Description: This function is used to check if the group belongs to Indirect Incomes or not.
IsGroupIndirectIncomes.Name: IsGroupIndirectIncomes

IsGroupInvestments.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Investments.
IsGroupInvestments.Name: IsGroupInvestments

IsGroupLoansLiab.Description: To check if the current object is the reserved group Loan Liability.
IsGroupLoansLiab.Name: IsGroupLoansLiab

IsGroupMiscExp.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Misc Expenses or not.
IsGroupMiscExp.Name: IsGroupMiscExp

IsGroupProvisions.Description: This function is used to check if the group belongs to “Provisions” or not.
IsGroupProvisions.Name: IsGroupProvisions

IsGroupPurchase.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Purchase Accounts or not.
IsGroupPurchase.Name: IsGroupPurchase

IsGroupReserves.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Reserves & Surplus or not.
IsGroupReserves.Name: IsGroupReserves

IsGroupSales.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Sales Accounts or not.
IsGroupSales.Name: IsGroupSales

IsGroupSecuredLoans.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Secured Loans or not.
IsGroupSecuredLoans.Name: IsGroupSecuredLoans

IsGroupStock.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Stock in hand or not.
IsGroupStock.Name: IsGroupStock

IsGroupSundryCreditors.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to SundryCreditors or not.
IsGroupSundryCreditors.Name: IsGroupSundryCreditors

IsGroupSundryDebtors.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Sundry Debtors or not.
IsGroupSundryDebtors.Name: IsGroupSundryDebtors

IsGroupSuspense.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Suspense A/c or not.
IsGroupSuspense.Name: IsGroupSuspense

IsGroupUnsecuredLoans.Description: This function is used to check if the specified group belongs to Unsecured Loans or not.
IsGroupUnsecuredLoans.Name: IsGroupUnsecuredLoans

IsLedgerProfit.Description: This function is used to check if the specified Ledger is  Profit & Loss A/c or not. If no parameter is specified then it checks whether the current object is Profit & Loss A/c or not.
IsLedgerProfit.Name: IsLedgerProfit

IsNegSDF.Description: To check if the Symbol prefix used during SDF import/export has been specified as (-). It returns a logical value.
IsNegSDF.Name: IsNegSDF

IsNotApplicable.Description: To check whether the parameter passed is marked as Not Applicable.
IsNotApplicable.Name: IsNotApplicable

IsNumber.Description: To check if the parameter passed has only numbers.
IsNumber.Name: IsNumber

IsPatternMatch.Description: This function is used to check if the regex pattern matches the input string.
IsPatternMatch.Name: IsPatternMatch

IsSysName.Description: This function returns 'Yes' if the expression passed as parameter is a System Name or not.
IsSysName.Name: IsSysName

IsSysNameEqual.Description: This Function takes two parameters as input and checks if the string value passed is equivalent to the SysName which is given as first parameter. If it is equal then it returns 'Yes' Else 'No'.
IsSysNameEqual.Name: IsSysNameEqual

IsTDLSysNameEqual.Description: This Function takes two parameters as input and checks if the string value passed is equivalent to the TDLSysName which is given as first parameter. If it is equal then it returns 'Yes' Else 'No'.
IsTDLSysNameEqual.Name: IsTDLSysNameEqual

IsValidFileName.Description: This function is used to check whether the entered File name contains disallowed characters, If found it will return FALSE.
IsValidFileName.Name: IsValidFileName

LanguageSysValue.Description: This function returns the language specific value for the string passed. If value is stored in some other language and the user changes the language then value returned by the function will be in the selected language.
LanguageSysValue.Name: LanguageSysValue

LanguageTDLSysValue.Description: This function gives the string display name for TDL sysnames according to the selected language.
LanguageTDLSysValue.Name: LanguageTDLSysValue

LocaleString.Description: The function $$LocaleString is used to provide multilingual support for TDL. It uses Unicode to provide support for different languages. It accepts a single parameter and make it unicode compatible. Strings which are presented through $$LocaleString are identified for Translation. Strings with out $$LocaleString are displayed in English. Now suppose the strings are displayed using this function and there is no translation for that, then the same string will appear in English.
LocaleString.Name: LocaleString

MakeEllipsis.Description: This function is used to make ellipsis of a string.
MakeEllipsis.Name: MakeEllipsis

NewLine.Description: This function returns a new line character. This can be concatenated with strings to provide a newline character between them.
NewLine.Name: NewLine

NumAdjustmentClassification.Description: Gives the number of Adjustment Classification available.
NumAdjustmentClassification.Name: NumAdjustmentClassification

NumAttdTypes.Description: Gives the total number of Attendance/Production Voucher Types in current company.
NumAttdTypes.Name: NumAttdTypes

NumBudgets.Description: Gives the total number of Budgets present in the current company.
NumBudgets.Name: NumBudgets

NumClientRules.Description: Gives the number of client rule existing in current company.
NumClientRules.Name: NumClientRules

NumCostCategories.Description: Gives the total number of CostCategories present in the current company.
NumCostCategories.Name: NumCostCategories

NumCostCentres.Description: Gives the total number of Cost Centres present in the current company.
NumCostCentres.Name: NumCostCentres

NumCurrencies.Description: Gives the total number of currencies present in the current company.
NumCurrencies.Name: NumCurrencies

NumDeducteeTypes.Description: Gives the number of Deductee Types masters existing in current company.
NumDeducteeTypes.Name: NumDeducteeTypes

NumEmployeeGroups.Description: Gives the total number of employees groups for the payroll in current company.
NumEmployeeGroups.Name: NumEmployeeGroups

NumEmployees.Description: Gives the total number of employees for the payroll in current company.
NumEmployees.Name: NumEmployees

NumExciseDutyClassification.Description: Gives the number of excise duty classification  available.
NumExciseDutyClassification.Name: NumExciseDutyClassification

NumFBTATypes.Description: Gives the number of FBTAType available.
NumFBTATypes.Name: NumFBTATypes

NumFBTCategory.Description: Gives the number of FBT Category available.
NumFBTCategory.Name: NumFBTCategory

NumFixedClientRules.Description: Gives the number of fixed client rule existing in current company.
NumFixedClientRules.Name: NumFixedClientRules

NumGodowns.Description: Gives the total number of Godowns created for the current company.
NumGodowns.Name: NumGodowns

NumGroups.Description: Gives the total number of Groups present in the current company.
NumGroups.Name: NumGroups

NumGSTClassification.Description: Gives the number of GST Classifications.
NumGSTClassification.Name: NumGSTClassification

NumIncomeTaxClassification.Description: Gives the number of IT Slab available.
NumIncomeTaxClassification.Name: NumIncomeTaxClassification

NumIncomeTaxSlab.Description: Gives the number of IT Classification available.
NumIncomeTaxSlab.Name: NumIncomeTaxSlab

NumLBTClassification.Description: Gives the number of IT Slab available.
NumLBTClassification.Name: NumLBTClassification

NumLedgers.Description: Gives the total number of ledgers present in the current company.
NumLedgers.Name: NumLedgers

NumMerchantProfiles.Description: Gives the number of Merchant Profiles present in the current company.
NumMerchantProfiles.Name: NumMerchantProfiles

NumPayheads.Description: Gives the total number of PayHeads present in the current company.
NumPayheads.Name: NumPayheads

NumPriceLevels.Description: Gives the number of Price Levels present in the current company.
NumPriceLevels.Name: NumPriceLevels

NumScenarios.Description: Gives the total number of Scenarios created for the specific company.
NumScenarios.Name: NumScenarios

NumSerialNumber.Description: Gives the number of serial number's available.
NumSerialNumber.Name: NumSerialNumber

NumServerRules.Description: Gives the number of server rules created in the current company and mainly used for synchronization.
NumServerRules.Name: NumServerRules

NumStates.Description: Gives the number state objects available in Tally.
NumStates.Name: NumStates

NumStCategories.Description: Gives the number of ST categories available.
NumStCategories.Name: NumStCategories

NumStockCategories.Description: Gives the total number of Stock Categories present in the current company.
NumStockCategories.Name: NumStockCategories

NumStockGroups.Description: Gives the total number of Stock Groups in the Current Company.
NumStockGroups.Name: NumStockGroups

NumStockItems.Description: Gives the total number of Stock Items created for the current company.
NumStockItems.Name: NumStockItems

NumTariffClassification.Description: Gives the number of tariff classification object available.
NumTariffClassification.Name: NumTariffClassification

NumTaxUnit.Description: Gives the number of TAX Units available.
NumTaxUnit.Name: NumTaxUnit

NumTaxUnitByType.Description: Gives the number of TAX Units available based on given taxtype. Also it will give count of taxunits based on Applicable date specified as 2nd argument only in case of Gst Taxtype
NumTaxUnitByType.Name: NumTaxUnitByType

NumTCSRates.Description: Gives the number of TCS Rates available.
NumTCSRates.Name: NumTCSRates

NumTDSRates.Description: Gives the number of TDS Nature of Payments available.
NumTDSRates.Name: NumTDSRates

NumUnits.Description: Gives the number of Units of Measure present in the current company.
NumUnits.Name: NumUnits

NumVatClassifications.Description: Gives the number of Vat/Tax classifications available in the current company.
NumVatClassifications.Name: NumVatClassifications

NumVchTypes.Description: Gives the number of Voucher Types present in the current company.
NumVchTypes.Name: NumVchTypes

PercEncode.Description: This function will return the URL encoding of the Expression passed as Parameter.
PercEncode.Name: PercEncode

RemoveChar.Description: This function removes the specified character from the string.
RemoveChar.Name: RemoveChar

RemoveExcelNoiseCharacter.Description: This function returns a string after eliminating noise characters (such as tabs, spaces, and newlines) from the beginning and end of the string. If there are noise characters between two words, they will be replaced with a single space.
RemoveExcelNoiseCharacter.Name: RemoveExcelNoiseCharacter

RemovePattern.Description: This function removes the values mentioned in the pattern from the string
RemovePattern.Name: RemovePattern

SeparatorChar.Description: This function returns C_SEPARATOR character that is used internally by Tally.
SeparatorChar.Name: SeparatorChar

Sprintf.Description: This function is introduced to help display the concatenated text properly in the translated version. Using $$LocaleString function, the text would become intertwined and would become unreadable.
Sprintf.Name: Sprintf

StrByCharCode.Description: This function returns a string containing the character, given the character CODE passed as parameter
StrByCharCode.Name: StrByCharCode

String.Description: This function converts the expression which is passed as parameter to a string.
String.Name: String

StringFindAndReplace.Description: This function find a pattern and replaces it with another in a String
StringFindAndReplace.Name: StringFindAndReplace

StringLength.Description: This function will return the length of the Expression passed as Parameter.
StringLength.Name: StringLength

StringPart.Description: This function is used to extract & return characters from an expression which is passed as 1st parameter. This function starts fetching the characters from the 1st parameter with the starting position as 2nd parameter. Now the number of characters to fetch is specified as 3rd parameter.The first character of an expression is identified as 0th position.i.e., the position of Nth character of an expression is identified as (N-1). Therefore to fetch Nth character of an expression the 2nd parameter should be (N-1) and 3rd parameter is 1.
StringPart.Name: StringPart

StringRemovePrefixSuffix.Description: This function removes the specified prefix/suffix from given string. If the prefix/suffix is not found the same input string is returned. The prefix/suffix comparison is not case sensitive. Last parameter is optional if not specified or specified as NO then function will attempt removal of prefix.
StringRemovePrefixSuffix.Name: StringRemovePrefixSuffix

StringRemWord.Description: This function returns the remaining word of a string that appears after the given position.
StringRemWord.Name: StringRemWord

StringWord.Description: This function extracts the word from a string espression based on the specified position.This function fetches the word from a string, whose position is specified as 1st parameter.
StringWord.Name: StringWord

StringWordEx.Description: Give the value according to position of the expression
StringWordEx.Name: StringWordEx

SysName.Description: System names are specified using this function. For representing some system names, this function is used. The parameter should be passed without any quotes.
SysName.Name: SysName

TDLSysName.Description: This function gives the string display name for TDL sysnames according to the language selected.
TDLSysName.Name: TDLSysName

Translate.Description: This function translates the specified string expression based on language id. If not specified then by default this is English.
Translate.Name: Translate

TrimNeg.Description: This function is used for removing the negative sign . If the value is positive it will return the same value. Otherwise remove the sign and return the positive value.
TrimNeg.Name: TrimNeg

VarRangeValue.Description: This function returns a list of specified character separated values of a given variable between the start and end postions.
VarRangeValue.Name: VarRangeValue

ZeroFill.Description: This function will prefix the string specified by the first argument with the number of zeros based on the length of the string specified by the second argument. In the Syntax String is the  parameter which is passed. Num is the maximum length of the String.
ZeroFill.Name: ZeroFill
